items.title: US East Coast faces life-threatening waves from Hurricane Erin
items.description: The Category 4 storm threatens to bring life-threatening surf and rip currents to the US East Coast.

items.title: Spain and Portugal fires kill two more as Spanish troops battle blazes
items.description: Spain has sent 500 more troops to wildfire-affected regions, bringing the total deployed to 1,900.

items.title: What each side wants from Ukraine talks at White House
items.description: As world leaders dash across the Atlantic for crunch talks, what will they and the others present regard as a win?

items.title: 'The water had no mercy': Hundreds killed as floods ravage north Pakistan
items.description: BBC visited villages which were wiped out overnight by rains, flash floods and landslides.

items.title: BBC witnesses West Bank attack by masked Israeli settlers
items.description: The BBC's Lucy Williamson says the incident near Nablus was "completely unprovoked".
